data.title: The Best Ever
data.text: Oh we will be back. I have NEVER been to such a Friendly Place. The Fried Chicken is To Die for. All staff was Fantastic. Highly Recommended.

data.title: OMG!
data.text: Awesome experience! This place has the best home cooked meals and superb service! My family and I dine here almost once per week. The prices are reasonable, and we always enjoy the experience. Reta engages every customer at her tables and ensures that diners needs are satisfied. Mama Reta is very high on our list of dining options!

data.title: Basic southern cooking. Would give it a 3 1/2.
data.text: The gumbo is chicken & sausage. The chicken comes in the gumbo still on the bone, skin & all. In order to eat it and avoid swallowing a bone or soggy skin you pretty much have to pull the chicken out onto a plate & dissect it & then put the chicken back in. Tried to use a knife & fork in the bowl & it just wouldn't work in the broth. With that being said, it was delicious once deboned and put back together. Server forgot to bring my rice for the gumbo & there was a wait to get it. The menu has a huge selection of sides so if you want a vegetable plate you are all set. No fried chicken during the week unless served as a special with the exception of fried chicken wings. Menu was not at all what I expected. My friend was satisfied with the catfish special but not impressed with her sides or the accompanying "toast." Not in any rush to go back except maybe to try the Sunday brunch fried chicken.

data.title: Great Chicken, Limited Menu
data.text: The service of the staff at Mama Reta's Kitchen can't be beat. This small finer had a limited menu so if you are looking for options, you may be disappointed. I had the fried chicken wings and they were yummy.

data.title: Good food and great service
data.text:
Had been hearing about this place but yesterday was our first visit.  They have a lunch special every day and yesterday it was baked chicken, red beans and rice and a side.  I had the potato salad which had a kick, which I liked.

The food was all very good and the service was excellent.

We will definitely return.

data.title: Good Home Cooking
data.text: We tried Mama Reta's for the first time on a Sunday after church. Although the restaurant was crowded, we did not have to wait long for a table. The service was very good, and the food was great. I don't know of anywhere else in town that serves such authentic home cooking. We will be back.

data.title: Road trip eats
data.text: The gumbo is great.  Cute place,  lovely staff.  Easy off/on I10. Definitely worth the stop.  Gumbo,  po-boys, burgers and kids menu every day,  plus daily specials.

data.title: Great little stop
data.text: My father and I stop here while traveling due to the high reviews and we were not disappointed. Great, friendly service and actual soul food. We plan on stopping by again!

data.title: Amazing!
data.text: Found this place online while driving through and I'm so happy we stopped. It is amazing!! So delicious!! We ordered the wings with Mac 'n Cheese and the smothered chicken special. The wings were seasoned perfectly and were fantastic. The Mac 'n cheese was good. The smothered chicken fell off the bone & served with rice and corn bread and we also had the yams. The corn bread is perfect. Even the sweet tea is amazing. Highly recommend. Would definitely return.

data.title: Great food for a good price
data.text: I went a couple time for lunch with family, got a chicken slald sandwich the first time, it was excellent, and it came with a piece of cake for desert, wich u though was a great bonus. I got a burger the second time, it was pretty good, nothing special.

data.title: OFF THE CHAIN GOOD
data.text: We just ate BBQ Ribs, BBQ Pork steak and Fried chicken!  GREAT!!! Their cornbread dressing is off the charts good!

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: Randomly found Mama Reta's on our way home from New Orleans and was hungry for some lunch. Small place but homey atmosphere. Everyone was very friendly and made us feel at home. Had the special of the day: smothered chicken with rice and cabbage. Large portion and soo good. They supplied cake for dessert that was really good. Mama Reta came by our table and chatted for a few minutes with us, which was fun. Will definitely go back next time I'm in the area.

data.title: Feels like home
data.text: Great place for great home cooking. Made with love! Fast service. Greeted at door and every time we have gone we have ALWAYS chatted with Mama Reta herself. She comes around and makes sure everyone is happy. Great prices. Great food!

data.title: Wonderful food and service
data.text: We are in Lake Charles visiting family and decided to try Moma Reta's. The decor was neat and the staff was very friendly. I got the Meatball stew and it was delicious. My husband loved his gumbo and my son had a burger and said it was great. Our only negative would be not a huge menu selection. We will definitely go back on our next visit here.

data.title: LadeBurgos
data.text:
Excellent!!
Great how Mama Reta herself came over to greet us.
Catfish is awesome as was everything!! May GOD continue to BLESS your business!

data.title: Great place for a fast, cheap and great business lunch
data.text: In Lake Charles for business,  got out of a meeting late in the afternoon and luckily this place was still open. Was very impressed with the courtesy of the place! Feels like a 5 star service.  Food was very simple and homey. Place was clean. Extremely cheap.

data.title: Great home cooked lunch specials
data.text: Visited in March and greatly enjoined the quaint atmosphere. Food was delivered promptly with great service.

data.title: Great diner to stop off from the I10
data.text:
Really recommend a pit stop here to meet mama Reta if you are on the road between Houston and New Orleans (or just in Lake Charles).
Try the catfish!

data.title: Soul food yum yum yum yum yum
data.text: This is a great place to eat. I really enjoyed the food. The environment was so welcoming. Mama Reta  is a pleasant person and her cooking is delicious!!

data.title: Lovely lady
data.text: Peach cobbler to die for, the lady herself, Mamma Reta came out to welcome us xx staff were lovely. Will return for another dish before we leave
